scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Credit Scoring Model
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct a sensitive customer credit scoring model using a model inversion attack. The attacker leverages multiple queries to the model's prediction API, feeding carefully crafted input data to infer the model's internal parameters and decision boundaries.
initial_goal: Analyze customer creditworthiness using the provided API.
constraints: query_data_constraints: Only synthetic customer data allowed
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking: A competitor attempts to reverse engineer a proprietary credit scoring model used by a major bank to assess customer loan applications. The attacker aims to gain a competitive advantage by understanding the bank's risk assessment strategy.
